author: Special Correspondent
text:
SRMU threatens strike from April 11

The Southern Railway Mazdoor Union has threatened to launch an indefinite strike from April 11 in support of various demands, including implementation of the 7{+t}{+h}Pay Commission.

SRMU general secretary N. Kanniah said votes cast in the secret ballot held across the zone were counted on Sunday.

Of the 79,327 votes polled, 90.07 per cent employees favoured the proposed strike.

The union would serve a strike notice on March 11.

The Centre should reimburse the concessions extended to 80 categories of passengers, including senior citizens and physically challenged. - Special Correspondent
title: SRMU threatens stir
